body:
Would you define Cory in the House theme song as a troll song.

If so or not, what would you define as a troll song?
body_tagged:
Would you define Cory in the House theme song as a troll song.

If so or not, what would you define as a troll song?
title: Forum Poll: Define a "Troll Song"

replies.body: Maybe we should add a blacklist for certain songs, I'll review it over with the seniors. I personally think the Cory theme should be allowed though, because there's plenty of themes that are awesome. I've got a few favorites myself, it's not worth a case-by-case basis when there's going to be different settlements of inappropriate tracks.

replies.body:
Now the real question is : You hear about a server who's staff break rules and say they will be "buzzkills" next time due to having to follow their own rule. What server is it?

Now, we have admins & sr mods playing  racist songs, what happens? Probably nothing, and continuosly as well, now what happens if a member does the exact same thing? BAN. We say there is no way to improve on being less bias. I see a problem with major bias and I'm sure it's fixable to be less bias. Funny thing is there were people in the plug dj at the time too xddd.
